message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115.  It's in great condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $115 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $105 isn't quite enough for me. I'm willing to come down to $110.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make a deal!
